Title: The Week
Writer: Rick Gomez, Rick Gomez, Jon Gunn, Jon Gunn, John W. Mann, John W. Mann
Actors: Rick Gomez, Joelle Carter, Richard Speight Jr., Amanda Detmer
Plot: THE WEEK is the story of Dick Romans - a washed up TV host whose wife leaves him the day before their week-long ten year anniversary celebration in wine country. Dick finds himself alone ...
